title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text: In this report we profile the meninges of APP mice in terms of Tertiary Lymphatic Structures (TLSs). The following chapters provide insight to different aspects of the TLSs, such as their location, distribution and density.

title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text: In this report we profile the meninges of APP mice in terms of Tertiary Lymphatic Structures (TLSs). The following chapters provide insight to different aspects of the TLSs, such as their location, distribution and density.

title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text:
Exploratory statistics
The current analysis includes data on 527 lymphatic structures from 41 mice, belonging to 1 strains, 3 age categories and 2 genders, for a total of 6 groups (Table 1).




Table 1: Basic statistics on the TLSs from mice meninges. Size and length are measured in mm, whereas phenotype and sinus location are reported in terms of the number of structures per each phenotype or sinus location, respectively.

Figure 1 shows the distribution the TLSs distribute in terms of their length and size across all tissues.





Figure 1: Barplots of tertiary lyphatic structures distributed by (A) diameter and (B) distance from confluence in mm.

title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text:
Distribution of structures





Figure 2: Scatter plot of TLSs around meninges. Each dot represents one structure, sized by dimension, coloured by phenotype and labeled by sample. Each panel corresponds to a mice group based on sex and age category.

title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text:
Density of structures





Figure 3: 2d Binned plot of tertiary limphatic structures around meninges. Colour indicates number of structures found in each hexagonal cell. Each panel corresponds to a mice group based on sex and age category.

title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text:
Distribution and Density of structures





Figure 4: Density plot of TLSs around meninges. Each dot represents one structure, sized by dimension, coloured by phenotype. Colour indicates the fraction of structures found in each pixel. Each panel corresponds to a mice group based on sex and age category.

title: Whithin-Strain Analysis
text:
Distribution by phenotype





Figure 5: 2d Binned plot of tertiary limphatic structures around meninges by phenotype (1, 2 or 3). Colour indicates number of structures found in each hexagonal cell. Rows correspond to a mice group based on sex and age category, whereas columns represent phenotypes.
